text: Tya lokanni allahala soduna apalya dharma-jnani ani dharmacaryanna raba (svami, palanahara) banavile ahe, ani mariyamaputra masihala vastavika tyanna ekameva allahacica upasana karanyaca adesa dila gela hota, jyacyakherija konihi upasana-yogya nahi to tyancya sirka karanyapasuna pavitra (paka) ahe
